goal: For each country of the world identify their main legislation and where it can be access online (url). If the country have a federal organization, also identify each of the regulation of each state like administration.

answer:
::PLAN Extract the list of countries from one of the search results.

1. Open the website [List of Countries of the world in alphabetical order](https://www.worldometers.info/geography/alphabetical-list-of-countries/)
2. Extract the list of countries from the website.
3. Store the list of countries in memory.
::ASK_CLARIFICATION Which website would you like me to use to extract the list of countries?
